title: Healthcare Realty Trust Nears Deal With Healthcare Trust of America
sub_head: Cash-and-stock deal could be finalized within days, sources say
body:
Healthcare Trust of America Inc., which owns and operates medical-office buildings around the country, is in advanced talks to combine with smaller rival Healthcare Realty Trust Inc. in a deal that could create a company worth more than $10 billion.
A cash-and-stock deal could be finalized by early next week, people familiar with the matter said, though the talks could still fall apart. Details of the potential transaction couldnâ€™t be learned. The expected move would culminate a monthslong sale process run by Healthcare Trust of America.
